name: Omnara
long_description: Omnara brings Claude Code to your phone. Start a coding session on your desktop, then seamlessly hand off to mobile and keep building whether you're commuting, traveling, or away from your desk. Code in local or remote environments with full context preservation across devices. Plus, use voice to code hands-free by having natural conversations with Omnara to build, debug, and ship from anywhere.
one_liner: Mobile & Voice Interface for Claude Code
